post.body: you didn't stop and say "hey" - yes, we are quite proud of the Iowa based Kum & Go stores. Although the name is a bit tricky
funny dream, I'd say you've been bitten by the i-bug.
I see good conversations in my stream & then follow. I NEVER follow because someone tells me, old childhood warning from mom
I do too. When I started, I followed all that follow me, not the case anymore.
yes, and I guess that is why the unfollow option is here right;D
I think many came to twitter to increase their network, thus their sales, OK, but you're right, do it by building relationships.
it just hit me wrong. Assumption I would need the products and shameless promotion during my fun time:)
for what? Is this spam?
http://twitpic.com/x8sh - I thought it might be broadband vs. dial up that you've had all week?
you're my gym hero! Need some suggestions on new shoes. Will DM you later!
one suggest before I go, why not integrated communications? Doesn't that say it all? Comms must be integrated to resonate
snappy it was! Wii lives on!
problem is everyone thinks we named it that after some big GM vehicle. Lots of 'splaining to do.
We changed our name 10 years ago to envoy, which means messenger. Was just some retired folk's names;d
gotcha. I'm baffled why we stay with the old advertising, marketing, pr descriptor. But that's what folks know. Doesn't fit.
I should have said "sales support" which is what we do for many clients - collateral work. It is comms, but not media strat
Nanny 911 on CMT reminds of how glad I am that my kids are almost grown.
Not interested in weight loss, not overweight. If I tweet calorie intake during holidays, don't reply w/your weight loss site, irritating.
Off to the gym, I have a ridiculous amount of calories to burn. I've been in food overdrive for two weeks.
Does anyone know how @JasonFalls is?
